name: these four walls called reality.
description:
Four Walls.

Two Worlds.

One Conversation.

Life in the face of Death.

Inspired by 'The Shadows That Run Alongside Our Car' by Lox Rain, this visual novel features two strangers sharing a conversation about life when surrounded by flesh-eating zombies in the middle of an apocalypse. TFWCR was made by a beginner over a course of 3 months and was released on January 2018. Told from the viewpoint of Tabbris, the visual novel has a total of 4 endings.

Recommended for 14 and above.

Content Warnings: Mild Violence
